programme.desc: For over 80 years, the Golden Globes has championed artistry in all of its forms, honoring the very best achievements in both film and television. The annual show brings the most stars together under one roof to kick-off awards season, creating some of the most talked-about moments in Hollywood and beyond.

programme.title: Top Chef Junior S2
programme.desc: Season 2 Finale. The pressure is on as only one thing is now standing between our chefs and the title of Top Chef Junior: each other. The final 2 chefs must give it their all as they dream up the meal of a lifetime. Top Chef Junior Season 1 finalists Rahanna & Owen, and cooking legend Emeril Lagass, all make special appearances in this thrilling conclusion as the final 2 chefs create mind-blowing menus demonstrating their growth from young cook to accomplished chef. To help them conquer this daunting task, a few familiar faces returnbut will these returning chefs lend a hand or could there be too many cooks in this kitchen? In the end, only one of the finalists will receive the title of Top Chef Junior!

programme.title: The National Dog Show ('20)
programme.desc: From the Kennel Club of Philadelphia, this cherished competition for all dog lovers returns for the 17th year. Hosted by John O'Hurley, the event features 2,000 of the nation's leading canines, including the worlds largest, smallest and most exotic. Over 170 breeds strut their stuff with the hope of becoming this year's top dog. The Dean David Frei provides expert show commentary, and Mary Carillo chimes in as an adept sideline reporter for this ultimate canine showdown. But which dog will have their day, and which will leave with their tail between their legs? After all, there can only be one Best in Show.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle
programme.desc: A super-powered Rocky almost defeats Fearless Leader, but accidentally overdoes it, driving Fearless Leader to take his powers into space for the ultimate space take-over-the-world evil plan

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is looking after Horace's underwater friends in the pond whilst Horace is away. He sees a funny creature with a round head, a long tail and a little mark on his nose. What's the funny little creature in the pond? Hey! That's the Big Question! The creature has vanished so Jess describes it to Mimi who draws a picture of it. Mimi, Joey and Jinx think it must be a fish and name him Freddie, but Jess is not so sure. Time passes and Jess doesn't see Freddie again for ages. When he does spot him he's grown two back legs! Jess decides he needs a closer look using Billie's magnifying glass. They search for Freddie all round the pond. Baa thinks he's found him, but it turns out to be a newt, with four legs and spots on its back. At that moment a small frog jumps out onto a lily pad. It has the white mark on its nose just like Freddie but this is a frog! What's happened wonders Jess. Horace comes back and explains that frogs start out as tadpoles and gradually change, growing legs and losing their tail.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Horace has planned a big musical show but before it can start it begins raining and everyone runs for shelter. How can we keep dry? Asks JESS - that's the Big Question. Jess, Baa and Billie find shelter under some vine leaves. They're keeping dry but they're too far away from the pond to watch the show. Jess thinks that maybe they could wear a hat to keep dry Baa's hat is soft and lets the water in though so that's no good but it gives Jess another idea. They can use the big basket in his barn as a giant hat to keep them all dry. It's made of wood and is hard. It's bound to keep them dry. But the woven basket lets the water in too. What are they going to do? Mimi walks by with her umbrella. She's lovely and dry. They all try to crowd under it but it's not big enough. We need to build a BIG umbrella says Jess. And they can use the vine leaves that kept them dry earlier. Perfect. The friends all build a huge umbrella that they can shelter under as they listen to Horace's fantastic music show. They've

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: JESS, and his friends are looking after Kevin the carp while Horace goes to visit a friend. They decide to clean out HORACE'S pond for him and take all the yukky pond weed to the river where the hungry fishes gobble it up. But when they get back they find that KEVIN is unhappy in his pond. How can I cheer up Kevin? That's the Big Question. First JESS thinks that KEVIN might be lonely so they take it in turns to keep him company. But KEVIN seems even more unhappy than before. Jess thinks that KEVIN is probably hungry. They saw the fish in the river eating weed so they go back to the river to get some for KEVIN. KEVIN gobbles up the weed, but he's soon looking sad again. JESS thinks that maybe staying in one place all the time is making KEVIN unhappy. So he gives him a little holiday in the river. KEVIN really perks up. A holiday seems to be the answer. Except that as soon as he's back in his pond KEVIN is miserable again. Horace comes back and explains to them s how pond weed helps fish to breathe, Jess r

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve on Greendale Farm. Jess is very very excited. Every year Mimi decorates the special tree in the woods and the friends all gather around to sing and play and open presents. But when Jess, Mimi and Willow arrive to leave presents at the tree they're shocked to see that the wind has blown all the decorations away! How dreadful! - How will they celebrate Christmas with no decorations? And Mimi can't help as she and Willow have promised to deliver presents outside the farm. Jess promises to work it out How can we decorate the Christmas Tree?' that's the Big Question!. He searches the farm for decorations but cannot find them. Then he realises he's found some lovely natural things that they can use to MAKE decorations. Yippety Yay! Of course! So everyone pulls together and gathers fircones and teasels, straw and bulrushes. As they sing the wond

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: There's a hole in the bottom of Baa's trough so none of the thirsty friends can have a drink. How can we mend the trough, wonders Jess. Hey, that's the Big Question. Jess decides to ask Horace for help but Horace has a problem of his own. He's trying to make a lovely new musical sound but the square shaped piece of bark he's got doesn't make a very good noise when he clangs it with a stick. Jess borrows the bark to cover the hole in the trough but it's the wrong shape. He decides to ask Mimi for help with making a different shape to cover the hole. Mimi's making a mosaic, but she can't find anything the right shape to fit the square-shaped hole she has. Jess gives her the bit of bark and it fits perfectly! She sings Jess a shapes song explaining all about different shapes around us. Jess finds a squashed clay pot which is circle shaped. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is looking after Horace's underwater friends in the pond whilst Horace is away. He sees a funny creature with a round head, a long tail and a little mark on his nose. What's the funny little creature in the pond? Hey! That's the Big Question! The creature has vanished so Jess describes it to Mimi who draws a picture of it. Mimi, Joey and Jinx think it must be a fish and name him Freddie, but Jess is not so sure. Time passes and Jess doesn't see Freddie again for ages. When he does spot him he's grown two back legs! Jess decides he needs a closer look using Billie's magnifying glass. They search for Freddie all round the pond. Baa thinks he's found him, but it turns out to be a newt, with four legs and spots on its back. At that moment a small frog jumps out onto a lily pad. It has the white mark on its nose just like Freddie but this is a frog! What's happened wonders Jess. Horace comes back and explains that frogs start out as tadpoles and gradually change, growing legs and losing their tail.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Horace has planned a big musical show but before it can start it begins raining and everyone runs for shelter. How can we keep dry? Asks JESS - that's the Big Question. Jess, Baa and Billie find shelter under some vine leaves. They're keeping dry but they're too far away from the pond to watch the show. Jess thinks that maybe they could wear a hat to keep dry Baa's hat is soft and lets the water in though so that's no good but it gives Jess another idea. They can use the big basket in his barn as a giant hat to keep them all dry. It's made of wood and is hard. It's bound to keep them dry. But the woven basket lets the water in too. What are they going to do? Mimi walks by with her umbrella. She's lovely and dry. They all try to crowd under it but it's not big enough. We need to build a BIG umbrella says Jess. And they can use the vine leaves that kept them dry earlier. Perfect. The friends all build a huge umbrella that they can shelter under as they listen to Horace's fantastic music show. They've

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: JESS, and his friends are looking after Kevin the carp while Horace goes to visit a friend. They decide to clean out HORACE'S pond for him and take all the yukky pond weed to the river where the hungry fishes gobble it up. But when they get back they find that KEVIN is unhappy in his pond. How can I cheer up Kevin? That's the Big Question. First JESS thinks that KEVIN might be lonely so they take it in turns to keep him company. But KEVIN seems even more unhappy than before. Jess thinks that KEVIN is probably hungry. They saw the fish in the river eating weed so they go back to the river to get some for KEVIN. KEVIN gobbles up the weed, but he's soon looking sad again. JESS thinks that maybe staying in one place all the time is making KEVIN unhappy. So he gives him a little holiday in the river. KEVIN really perks up. A holiday seems to be the answer. Except that as soon as he's back in his pond KEVIN is miserable again. Horace comes back and explains to them s how pond weed helps fish to breathe, Jess r

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve on Greendale Farm. Jess is very very excited. Every year Mimi decorates the special tree in the woods and the friends all gather around to sing and play and open presents. But when Jess, Mimi and Willow arrive to leave presents at the tree they're shocked to see that the wind has blown all the decorations away! How dreadful! - How will they celebrate Christmas with no decorations? And Mimi can't help as she and Willow have promised to deliver presents outside the farm. Jess promises to work it out How can we decorate the Christmas Tree?' that's the Big Question!. He searches the farm for decorations but cannot find them. Then he realises he's found some lovely natural things that they can use to MAKE decorations. Yippety Yay! Of course! So everyone pulls together and gathers fircones and teasels, straw and bulrushes. As they sing the wond

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: There's a hole in the bottom of Baa's trough so none of the thirsty friends can have a drink. How can we mend the trough, wonders Jess. Hey, that's the Big Question. Jess decides to ask Horace for help but Horace has a problem of his own. He's trying to make a lovely new musical sound but the square shaped piece of bark he's got doesn't make a very good noise when he clangs it with a stick. Jess borrows the bark to cover the hole in the trough but it's the wrong shape. He decides to ask Mimi for help with making a different shape to cover the hole. Mimi's making a mosaic, but she can't find anything the right shape to fit the square-shaped hole she has. Jess gives her the bit of bark and it fits perfectly! She sings Jess a shapes song explaining all about different shapes around us. Jess finds a squashed clay pot which is circle shaped. It's the perfect shape to mend the hole and because it's clay the water won't leak out again! They've answered the question. And here comes the rain again so the

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Dimension Demented When Ra tries to bring a jukebox to school by stuffing it into the Dimension Tube, he ends up sending himself on a terrifying inter-dimensional journey. programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt (S23)
programme.desc: Colby and Wade love visiting Ocean City on the weekends. Theyre searching for a condo with a deeded dock to fully enjoy quick getaways.

programme.title: It Takes A Man And A Woman
programme.desc: Miggy and Laida try to co-exist in the same company while Laida tries to oppose Miggy's business decisions through a series of events which made them realize the real definition of true love.

programme.title: A Hard Day
programme.desc: Dingdong Dantes (Detective Edmund Villon) plays a crooked policeman involved in a hit-and-run accident. John Arcilla (Lieutenant Ace Franco) plays another officer who tries to blackmail him.

programme.title: Pagdating ng Panahon
programme.desc: Lynette (Sharon Cuneta) is a conservative & religious lady who leads a boring life. So when she gets a marriage proposal from Manuel (Robin Padilla), whose family is known to be a brood of chauvinists, she was ecstatic.

programme.title: Dibdiban Ang Laban
programme.desc: After earning her college degree, Marian (Anjanette Abayari) returns to her small, far-flung hometown to become a teacher for the poor. But one day, Marian is captured by rebels as a way to get back at her oppressive father.

programme.title: I'm Sorry My Love
programme.desc: In the hope of landing a job that will eventually enable her to pay for her sisters operation, Tinay (Judy Ann Santos) leaves her small fishing village and heads for Manila.

programme.title: Pasahero
programme.desc: A group of train passengers' failure to help a woman in distress leads to a journey of conscience, redemption, and unexpected connections.

programme.title: The Wife
programme.desc: A couple's marriage gets tainted as the husband cheats. How can the wife take her husband's dying plea to be with her and his mistress at the remaining days of his life?

programme.title: Who's That Girl?
programme.desc: A one-of-a-kind romantic-comedy movie about a girl who is an alleged mistress of a business tycoon, husband to Eugene Domingo's character,and father to Luis Manzano's character.

programme.title: Fangirl Fanboy
programme.desc: It tells the story of a wannabe actor and a talented teleserye dubber who agrees to help him improve his acting. Her coaching helps him achieve his dream of becoming a star only to find herself heartbroken when he becomes successful.

programme.title: Torotot
programme.desc: Torotot explores the story of two couples, why and how their marriages crumble and how their infidelity and passions have brought them tragic endings.

programme.title: The Trigonal
programme.desc: An underground fighting circuit run by an international crime syndicate invades a retired MMA champion's small, idyllic island hometown. Syndicate thugs brutally assault his wife and kill his best friend, leaving him with no other choice but to fight for justice.

programme.title: Babaylan
programme.desc: An immortal woman falls for a dashing young man, without her knowing that his ancestor was her lover in the past. They must work together to escape an insane man who's after her fountain of youth.

programme.title: Sanggano, Sanggago't Sanggwapo
programme.desc: Three troublesome friends learns that one of them is actually rich when his father passes away and leaves him a hacienda.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E14 - The Falcon (Part 1)
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations E09 - The Great Depression (Part 1)
programme.desc: The dramatization of Alex Haley's family line from post Civil War America to the writer's search for his roots.

programme.title: Married With Children S5 E20 - Top of the Heap
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: Bewitched S5 E26 - Samantha Twitches For UNICEF
programme.desc: Another year of marriage between mortal and witch has the Stephens trying to cope with Samantha's meddling, magical family and their daughter's entrance into nursery school.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S12 E21 - Reparations
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.title: CSI S5 E15 - King Baby
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), theres something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 E22 - I Don't Remember Mama
programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: Stefanie teams up with ex-husband Chase to go to Iceland at Christmastime in search of the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a Chinese curse that turns out to be real to human remains in a Founding Father's basement. We uncover some of the world's most dangerous and deadly accidental discoveries.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: Would you believe that the beginnings of modern endoscopy were really all thanks to one professional sword-swallower? Or that lack of sleep could have some strange upsides?

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: From a dog's space voyage to a harrowing story of Arctic survival to various trips through time...these are the journeys so extraordinary that they are truly unbelievable.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: A car salesman has the visionary idea to start the first rental car company in America, and when he joins forces with cab company owner John Hertz, they spread their business across the country.

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)
programme.desc: Steeped in moonshine, bluegrass, and drag racing, and featuring seven generations of rusty gold, Bobby's Georgia homestead offers everything expected from an ultimate Southern pick.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S5)
programme.desc: It's 1935, and a hot-headed Kentucky gas station owner named Harland Sanders develops a new method for making fried chicken, drawing customers from far and wide.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: Would you believe that the beginnings of modern endoscopy were really all thanks to one professional sword-swallower? Or that lack of sleep could have some strange upsides?

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: A car salesman has the visionary idea to start the first rental car company in America, and when he joins forces with cab company owner John Hertz, they spread their business across the country.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: All over the world, there are giant monoliths that our ancient ancestors carved out of solid rock. But what was the purpose of these huge stone monuments? Did they serve some kind of ritual function?

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a Chinese curse that turns out to be real to human remains in a Founding Father's basement. We uncover some of the world's most dangerous and deadly accidental discoveries.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)
programme.desc: Sometimes the strangest things on Earth are happening just below its surface. These are the weird and wondrous tales of the sea beasts, hidden cities, and impossible creatures that lurk beneath us.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: For hundreds of years, there have been legends of vast treasures hidden throughout the United States. Stories of stolen gold, piracy, murderous revengebut are these legends of lost treasures tall tales?

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)
programme.desc: In Ohio, a late friend's picking nirvana has the Wolfe brothers howling. With a successful demolition business and an eye for treasure, Brian amassed a mind-boggling collection of rare, oversize gems.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: Three American retail icons are born within months of each other in 1962, sparking a rivalry for the ages as each fights to revolutionise shopping through innovation, low prices, and unique strategies.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: American cars get a makeover when an engineer creates the first sports car. And Detroit's Big 3 begin transforming their functional, practical cars into American sports cars.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: In the midst of the 1970s folk art movement, art student Martha Nelson creates a one-of-a-kind doll to sell at local Kentucky craft markets.

programme.title: Alone (S12)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a freak storm, the remaining survivalists take stock of their place in the game. One participant takes a risk on an ambitious shelter.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Dogu.

programme.title: BOSAI: Heavy Snow
programme.desc: Heavy snow falling in a short time can threaten lives when it piles up on roofs, paralyzes roads, and brings social functions to a halt. We'll examine the reasons why heavy snows falls on Japan.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to kaku, or "to write." Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #8 This is my friend, Ayaka-san. / To introduce someone to someone else, say a word to explain the relationship, followed by "no" and then the person's name and "desu".

programme.title: Samurai Sword Enthusiasts
programme.desc: The fact that foreign collectors cherish Japanese swords helps to unearth ancient works taken overseas after 1945. It also serves as a force for preserving traditional techniques facing extinction.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We introduce a lineup of programs conveying Japan's unique perspectives and cultural practices. Themes include falconry, etiquette, and the National Museum of Japanese History.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: Shirakawa-go is one of Japan's snowiest regions, famous for its traditional thatched-roof Gassho-style homes. Every detail of life here is reflected in the cooperative bond shared by residents.

programme.title: Preparation
programme.desc: Luna, a girl who is uncomfortable with doctor's office, comes to understand the value of medicine via the thrilling explanations of a mysterious doctor. This episode is about doctor's office.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japan where he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: YONEZAWA: "Beni," Japanese Red
programme.desc: Since ancient times, safflowers grown in Yonezawa have been used to dye fabric a deep red color associated with the sun. Experience its mysterious, vivid beauty through time-lapse footage.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM
programme.desc: The Ultimate in Urban Mining: This episode features companies that have come up with innovative ways of extracting strategic minerals such as gold, cobalt, and platinum from urban waste.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Gojinjo Taiko is a wild, powerful performance by masked drummers. It originated 400 years ago, when villagers disguised themselves as oni (demons) to scare away a warlord's army.

programme.title: JAPAN DELISH 5min.
programme.desc: Curry rice, one of Japan's most iconic national dishes. How did Jimbocho, Tokyo become a curry town?

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 11, Day 1 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the winter dates of Shokan and Daikan. The nuns teach us how to make seasonal rice porridge with seven herbs, kan-koji fermented rice and dried vegetables.

programme.title: 1/2: People Who Don't Drink
programme.desc: 1 in 2 don't drink in Japan, where intense social drinking is normal. Through interviews of drinkers and non-drinkers we hear both sides, including a couple who went sober and opened a no-alcohol bar.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: Furofuki daikon with two sauces. Both sauces use a fresh white miso base, but one is made with chopped butterbur and the other with yuzu citrus. Serve with boiled daikon.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Ashraf Baburi in Chiba Prefecture who provides work to women in his native Afghanistan by importing traditional rugs they weave, and French-born Stephane Danton who runs a tea store in Tokyo.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments

programme.title: Medical Frontiers

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: Shirakawa-go is one of Japan's snowiest regions, famous for its traditional thatched-roof Gassho-style homes. Every detail of life here is reflected in the cooperative bond shared by residents.

programme.title: Preparation

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Ashraf Baburi in Chiba Prefecture who provides work to women in his native Afghanistan by importing traditional rugs they weave, and French-born Stephane Danton who runs a tea store in Tokyo.

programme.desc: JJ sings his favorite classics! He dances to "Head, Shoulders, Knees, and Toes" & plays "Ten in the Bed"!

programme.desc: Nina's on an adventure with friends! She pretends to be a soccer star & drives a tractor on the farm!

programme.title: At Home with Cody and His Family!
programme.desc: It's a day at home with Cody's family! He helps his dad at the bakery & learns about African instruments!

programme.title: A Fun Day at School with Baby John!
programme.desc: It's a fun day at school! Baby John does arts & crafts, learns about animals & plays nice with his friends!

programme.title: What Should I Be When I Grow Up?
programme.desc: What should Baby John be when he grows up? He races an ambulance & learns about Mexican luchador superheroes!

programme.title: Answering Big Questions!
programme.desc: Blippi is answering big questions! He learns how to brush teeth, why we sneeze & how spiders make their webs!

programme.title: Fun Facts About The World!
programme.desc: Blippi learns fun facts about the world! He discovers how erasers work & why some animals are nocturnal!

programme.title: Causing Chaos All Over Town!
programme.desc: Arpo & Daniel cause chaos all over town! They have a wild supermarket chase & a messy picnic!

programme.title: Squirrel Trouble & Other Wacky Problems!
programme.desc: Arpo faces squirrel trouble & other wacky problems, like a ghost in the house & a malfunctioning music mode!

programme.title: JJ's Guide to Staying Healthy!
programme.desc: JJ learns to stay healthy! He learns to use the potty, washes his hands & goes to the doctor for a checkup!

programme.title: JJ's Favorite Games & Vehicles!
programme.desc: JJ plays his favorite games! He plays freeze dance, makes funny faces & builds with construction vehicles!

programme.title: JJ's Fun Learning Fundamentals!
programme.desc: JJ learns the fundamentals! He counts baby chicks with Grandpa, learns shapes & mixes colors with jello!

programme.title: Solving the Biggest Mysteries!
programme.desc: Mila & Morphle are solving mysteries! They find a stolen necklace & travel to the future!

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon 2

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protg who's hungry for success.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Detective Dee: The Ghosts in Weird Town
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a series of terrifying vampire transformations in Youming Town, uncovering a sinister conspiracy masterminded by Prince Li Zhen, who plots to overthrow the empire. Armed with courage and ingenuity, Dee defeats the bloodthirsty vampires and ultimately exposes the princes dark ambitions.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Detective Dee's Seven Deadly Sin
programme.desc: Detective Dee becomes embroiled in a series of murders that shake the Tang Empire. The killer invokes the "Seven Deadly Sins" to justify a twisted sense of justice. In his relentless pursuit of the truth, Detective Dee uncovers the mask of false righteousness and exposes the darkness hidden beneath.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husbands affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a stranger who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents

programme.title: Detective Dee's Seven Deadly Sin
programme.desc: Detective Dee becomes embroiled in a series of murders that shake the Tang Empire. The killer invokes the "Seven Deadly Sins" to justify a twisted sense of justice. In his relentless pursuit of the truth, Detective Dee uncovers the mask of false righteousness and exposes the darkness hidden beneath.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: When a young woman's body is pulled from the ocean off the Big Island, accusations threaten to destroy the local community. As tensions grow, a surprising discovery leads detectives to a devastating truth.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Shocking first-hand accounts of people who were manipulated, abused, and finally broke free before it was too late. We'll hear from former members of Gwen Shamblin's Remnant Fellowship, and more.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Melissa Lucio was sentenced to death for the murder of her two-year-old daughter, Mariah, and in January 2022 she was given an official execution date of April 27, 2022.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A young father and his family come under attack at a busy drive-thru. Terrified of his aggravated assailant, he fires his gun and allegedly injures an innocent bystander.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a beloved pastor's second wife is killed in a tragic car crash, it raises suspicions over the death of his first wife. Her death never sat easy with distinguished pathologist Dr. Wayne Ross.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Lakhvir Singh enjoyed cooking for Lucky Cheema, the man she loved. But when he left her to marry a much younger woman, Singh made the couple a meal that would turn out to be the last Lucky ever tasted.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A man is killed instantly after a head-on collision with a young mother driving home from a late-night shift at a Florida hotel. The Prosecution allege she was under the influence and caused the crash.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Matheau Moore sits down for a polygraph test with former FBI agent George Olivo. Though he was found not guilty of murdering his wife, suspicions still follow himeven among those closest to the case.

programme.title: Homicide Squad New Orleans (S1)
programme.desc: With the help of his partner Det. Hill, Det. Stewart tracks down the killers of a good Samaritan who was attempting to stop a crime in progress.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When a beloved schoolteacher is found murdered in her Neptune, New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: A visit to Mobile ends in tragedy when a violent chain reaction leads to the death of a teenage girl.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: On July 9th, 2018, officers from the Beckley Police Department received a distressing call from a woman claiming that she and her friends had been kidnapped and terrorised at the Travelodge on Harper Road.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Savannah and Trent Paschal seem like the perfect suburban couple madly in love. But when Savannah finds her calling as a funeral director, their romance ends in suspicion, and a countrywide police hunt.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: A young, pregnant woman is found dead of an apparent suicide in Saginaw, MI, but her family and friends don't believe it. The police discover a shocking secret they never saw coming.

programme.title: Jean Perera: The Beauty Queen Murder
programme.desc: When former Malaysian beauty queen Jean Perera was found brutally stabbed in 1979, the subsequent murder trial would capture and divide public opinion.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: When an off-duty Dallas police officer shoots a man in his own apartment, the jury will have to decide if it was murder or a tragic mistake. Amber Guyger takes the stand in her own defense.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: When railroad mechanic Robert Limon is shot and killed by Jonathan Hearn, an investigation leads to Robert's widow and spurs questions about her involvement in the crime.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: In 2019, Delinord Dumercy takes the stand for the second time, claiming that his decision to shoot and ultimately kill James Peoples was in self-defence and not murder.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Hlne Cochet, biologist specialising in mariculture, has been studying the European flat oyster for twenty years, the combat of her life. The only oyster native to France, yet virtually unknown to the general public. In a generation it has become forgotten, gradually replaced by the Pacific oyster from Asia. Report by: Nicolas Brikk, Chlo Ledoux.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Intrieurs
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to the must-see secondhand shops on the Belgian border at Le 194. Then, she discovers the skill of straw marquetry in Anne-Lise's workshop.

programme.title: Si Les Glaciers Ne Revenaient Pas
programme.desc: By the end of the 21st century, the majority of Alpine glaciers will have melted away. What will become of the 'bisses du Valais', the traditional irrigation network of canals for thaw water? In Switzerland, like elsewhere, the issue of mountain water is at the heart of the debates.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Tlvisions editorial team.

programme.title: Tlmatin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Tlmatin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Chef Lela Albert prepares a coconut and pineapple parfait.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Tljournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Intrieurs
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to the must-see secondhand shops on the Belgian border at Le 194. Then, she discovers the skill of straw marquetry in Anne-Lise's workshop.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Hlne Cochet, biologist specialising in mariculture, has been studying the European flat oyster for twenty years, the combat of her life. The only oyster native to France, yet virtually unknown to the general public. In a generation it has become forgotten, gradually replaced by the Pacific oyster from Asia. Report by: Nicolas Brikk, Chlo Ledoux.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Bote !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Ptole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Raconte Wanda Jemly
programme.desc: Children tell a story, a traditional tale or an anecdote to the Cameroonian author and storyteller Wanda Jemly. Smiles and emotion guaranteed!

programme.title: Raconte Wanda Jemly
programme.desc: Children tell a story, a traditional tale or an anecdote to the Cameroonian author and storyteller Wanda Jemly. Smiles and emotion guaranteed!

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itinraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enqute, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: Antoinette, Marcelle, Raymonde, Augustine... They were all aged over 70 and were all killed in the space of several months at home at the beginning of the 1990s. Only clue: the murders took place along the 192 bus route south of Paris...

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Flash(S) - Double Vue
programme.desc: Audrey Beau-Manoir has been charged with her husband's murder. Amnesic after the shock, she did not deny it. Today, her memory is coming back. Claire, who has had visions about the case, urges her daughter Mathilde to reopen the investigation.

programme.title: Version Franaise
programme.desc: The Albert-Kahn museum unveils the banker's humanist project. Sometimes called ''the time folder'', Simone Pheulpin works with cotton ribbon. For his first show at Dries Van Noten, Julian Klausner plays with textures and colours. Sophie Brillouet's studio is alive with beach air.

programme.title: Fifi
programme.desc: 15 year-old Sophie, known as Fifi, has to spend the summer with parents, brothers and sisters, in a cramped flat on a rowdy Nancy council estate. With her friend Jade away on holiday she pinches her keys and takes refuge in her flat. But Stphane, Jade's older brother, arrives unexpectedly...

programme.title: Frache
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: Propos D'Antoine
programme.desc: Julie arrives at Marc's, the new love of her life, to meet his family. The young woman has just ended an easy-going relationship to find herself thrown into a joyous chaos centred on Antoine, a child with multiple disabilities.

programme.title: Propos D'Antoine
programme.desc: Despite her feelings of insecurity, Julie has to borrow the bike belonging to Marc's ex-wife. The latter's home is filled with family photos and memorabilia making Julie wonder if everything is really sorted between the former couple.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his companys most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: Lilly's Disappearance (1)
programme.desc: A family vacation turns into a nightmare when 5-year-old Lilly disappears without a trace. As her frantic parents desperately search for her, friends become suspects. Could her parents themselves also be hiding something?

programme.title: Deal At The Border
programme.desc: Aza and Samat, two drug runners navigating the secret routes in the mountains of Central Asia, stumble upon Nazik, a young girl fleeing from slavery. When Nazik is recaptured by a criminal, facing a grim return to captivity, Aza resolves to save her.

programme.title: Behind the Mountains
programme.desc: After spending four years in jail for vandalizing his place of work, Rafik has only one plan, take his son to the mountains and show him his amazing discovery.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: The Reports on Sarah and Saleem
programme.desc: The illicit affair of a married Palestinian man and a married Israeli woman in Jerusalem takes a dangerous political dimension when they are spotted in the wrong place at the wrong time leaving them to deal with more than their broken marriages.

programme.title: NR24
programme.desc: The most ordinary man became the perfect spy. 22-year-old Gunnar Snsteby decides to resist Nazi-Germany on the day of the invasion to later lead the "Oslo-gang" in executing countless daring acts of sabotage making him Norway's greatest war hero.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his fathers vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his companys most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Copperman (OTO)
programme.desc: Anselmo, an adult with the mental age of a child, fights evil and the criminals who threaten his country as Copperman, thanks to the special armor given to him by the local blacksmith.

programme.title: Broken Reflections
programme.desc: Tushar, a 17-year-old boy, discovers his mother's extramarital affair on a school bunk which throws him into emotional and psychological turmoil.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: The Reports on Sarah and Saleem
programme.desc: The illicit affair of a married Palestinian man and a married Israeli woman in Jerusalem takes a dangerous political dimension when they are spotted in the wrong place at the wrong time leaving them to deal with more than their broken marriages.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his fathers vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: The Intangible Joy of Love
programme.desc: When the notorious liar Greta unexpectedly kisses the lonesome butcher Alex on the neck at a bus stop, both are unaware that this chance encounter is exactly what they have been missing in their lives

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: Copperman
programme.desc: Anselmo, an adult with the mental age of a child, fights evil and the criminals who threaten his country as Copperman, thanks to the special armor given to him by the local blacksmith.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: A Minute's Silence
programme.desc: In a small Baltic town, 18-year-old Christian and his teacher Stella fall for one another and begin a secret affair. However, the intensity of their feelings soon overwhelm them. When tragedy befalls Stella, Christian is forced to confront his first love.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 1: Done Is Done
programme.desc: Shelly Mohan, a housewife and mother of three, makes an irreparable decision and commits a horrific act when Charlie Lynch, a man from her troubled past, contacts her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 2: Post Mortem
programme.desc: Shelly's husband Jason, a Garda Detective, is delighted to be assigned to the case, with no sense where the trail may lead. While he and his co-worker, Fiona, focus on a sex worker, Shelly realizes she may have left evidence in the dead man's hotel room.

programme.title: Aspromonte: Land Of The Forgotten (OTO)
programme.desc: In 1959 in Africo, Aspromonte, a woman dies in childbirth because the lack of roads prevented the doctor from reaching in time. The tragedy unites the villagers and Giulia, a new teacher, to build a road. But Giulia must contend with local mafia Don Tot.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her familys biggest fear is not her going to jail, its preserving their honour.
